item.title: All Over Tonight
item.description: [[songs/m/mad_season/above/wake_up.md#wake-up-young-man-its-time-to-wake-up-vyl-wnanory|Ay-yea!]] [[songs/m/mad_season/above/wake_up.md#wake-up-young-man-its-time-to-wake-up-vyl-wnanory|It’s late, when I see your face,]] [[songs/m/mad_season/above/wake_up.md#wake-up-young-man-its-time-to-wake-up-vyl-wnanory|All crapped up in my room]] [[songs/m/mad_season/above/wake_up.md#wake-up-young-man-its-time-to-wake-up-vyl-wnanory|Well allright, well it’s taken all night,]] [[songs/m/mad_season/above/wake_up.

item.title: Forever Tonight
item.description: [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|I’ve been waiting all my life]] [[songs/p/perturbator/i_am_the_night/naked_tongues_feat_memory_ghosts_isabella_goloversic.md#i-have-waited-vyl-wnanory|For the moment to be right]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.md#im-not-that-person-in-the-night-vyl-wnanory|You and me]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.md#im-not-that-person-in-the-night-vyl-wnanory|Tonight could be the night]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/lesser_man_extended_version/run.

item.title: Planet Caravan
item.description: [[songs/s/semisonic/strangely_fine/secret_smile.md#so-use-it-and-prove-it-vyl-wnanory|We sail through endless skies]] [[songs/s/semisonic/strangely_fine/secret_smile.md#so-use-it-and-prove-it-vyl-wnanory|Stars shine like eyes]] [[songs/s/semisonic/strangely_fine/secret_smile.md#so-use-it-and-prove-it-vyl-wnanory|The black night sighs]] [[songs/k/killswitch_engage/killswitch_engage/temple_from_the_within.md#suffer-tears-me-down-vyl-wnanory|The Moon in silver trees]] [[songs/k/killswitch_engage/killswitch_engage/temple_from_the_within.

item.title: Suicide Note Pt. I
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/stone_sour/bother.md#wish-i-was-too-dead-to-care-vyl-wnanory|Cheap cocaine, a dry inhale, the pills that kill and take the pain away (take the pain away)]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/stone_sour/bother.md#wish-i-was-too-dead-to-care-vyl-wnanory|Diet of life, shelter without, the face that cannot see inside yours and mine (yours and mine)]] [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.

item.title: Takin’ My Life
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|I can see]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|I know it was meant to be]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|You can be what you want to be]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/catastrophe.md#i-can-see-what-you-see-what-you-asked-for-it-has-to-be-vyl-wnanory|Just set yourself free]] [[songs/p/pantera/i_am_the_night/forever_tonight.

item.title: This Love
item.description: [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.md#schoolboy-q-and-kendrick-lamar-vyl-wnanory|If ever words were spoken]] [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.md#schoolboy-q-and-kendrick-lamar-vyl-wnanory|Painful and untrue]] [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.md#schoolboy-q-and-kendrick-lamar-vyl-wnanory|I said I loved but I lied]] [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.md#schoolboy-q-and-kendrick-lamar-vyl-wnanory|In my life]] [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.md#schoolboy-q-and-kendrick-lamar-vyl-wnanory|All I wanted]] [[songs/k/kendrick_lamar/section80/the_spiteful_chant.
